original_text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
korean_text: 주께서 내 곁에 서서 나에게 힘을 주심은 나로 말미암아 선포된 말씀이 온전히 전파되어 모든 이방인이 듣게 하려 하심이니 내가 사자의 입에서 건짐을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 주께서 나와 함께 계셨고

sentences.original_text: that by me the preaching might be fully known
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 통해 전파가 온전히 알려지게 하려 하심이요

sentences.original_text: and that all the Gentiles might hear
and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion
